body:
cc/ @eliasnaur Resurrecting this issue. We'd like to focus on making mobile subrepo fully tested at least on darwin/x86 builders that have mobile devices attached. Currently failed tests: 
darwin-amd64-10_10 at e806cd9f95ccf14163623792425db2b066d4198e building mobile at 2e1e39e5a64203ad7ed9716e117333cc0622885a
